account.title: Account Information
account.description: Manage your account details and preferences.

darkMode.label: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Enable dark mode for a comfortable visual experience in low light.

fontSize.label: Font Size
fontSize.description: Adjust the font size for better readability.

push.label: Push Notifications
push.description: Receive push notifications on your devices.

security.title: Security Settings
security.description: Manage your account's security and access.

twoFactor.label: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account.

confirmation.title: Are you absolutely sure?
confirmation.description: This action cannot be undone. It will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.

workflows.linkCopiedDescription: You can now share the link to your workflow with others
workflows.updateErrorDescription: An error occurred while updating the workflow. Please try again.
workflows.deleteErrorDescription: An error occurred while deleting the workflow. Please try again.
workflows.validationErrorDescription: Please fill in all required fields.
workflows.nodeResetDescription: Are you sure you want to reset the node?
workflows.nodeAddedDescription: The node has been added to the workflow.

login.description: Enter your credentials below to login
login.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

register.fillInDetails: Fill in your details to create a new account
register.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.checkEmailDescription: If an account exists for this email, you will receive a password reset link shortly.

features.title: Features
features.description: Automate your tasks by connecting your favorite services. Simple, powerful, and accessible to everyone.
features.intro: Create automated workflows between your favorite applications.
features.pricing: Plans adapted to your needs, from free to enterprise.
features.integrations: More than 100 compatible services for your automations.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.api: Complete documentation of our public API.
documentation.source: Access our source code on GitHub.

enterprise.title: Enterprise
enterprise.cases: Discover how our clients use LinkIt.
enterprise.contact: Let's talk about your specific needs.

home.description: Automate your tasks by connecting your favorite services. Simple, powerful, and accessible to everyone.

team.title: Meet our team
team.description: We're a dynamic group of individuals who are passionate about what we do and dedicated to delivering the best results for our clients.

features.title: Automate your workflows
features.subtitle: Everything you need to automate your workflows

mobile.title: Mobile friendly
mobile.description: Our mobile app is designed to be user-friendly and easy to use, with a focus on simplicity and efficiency.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Execute your workflows instantly with our high-performance infrastructure. Real-time automation without delays.

scalability.title: Scalability
scalability.description: Create unlimited workflows and automate as many tasks as you need. Our platform grows with your automation needs.

connect.title: Connect Your Apps
connect.description: Seamlessly integrate your favorite apps like Discord, YouTube, and Google services. Create powerful automated workflows that work together.

stack.description: LinkIt allows you to orchestrate your favorite apps and services with a wide range of integrations.

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Connect your Discord account to automate your workflows and stay connected with your community effortlessly.

apple.title: Apple
apple.description: Connect your Apple account to automate your workflows and seamlessly integrate with your Apple ecosystem.

google.title: Google
google.description: Connect your Google account to automate your workflows and enhance productivity with Google services.

github.title: Github
github.description: Connect your Github account to automate your workflows and streamline your development process.

youtube.title: Youtube
youtube.description: Connect your Youtube account to automate your workflows and manage your video content more efficiently.

twitch.title: Twitch
twitch.description: Connect your Twitch account to automate your workflows and engage with your audience in real-time.

cta.description: Create your first workflow in minutes with our easy workflow builder.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.description: Enter your new password below to reset your password.
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.
